afterMCPExecution.command: if [ "$MCP_SERVER" = "user-memory" ]; then cd ~/ghq/github.com/Tyaba/vault && git add mcp_server_memory/memory.jsonl && git diff --cached --quiet || (git commit -m 'Auto-sync: memory update via MCP' && git push origin main); fi
afterMCPExecution.description: Sync memory.jsonl after memory MCP execution

sessionEnd.description: Pull latest vault changes at session end

stop.command: if [ "$(uname)" = "Darwin" ]; then afplay /System/Library/Sounds/Submarine.aiff; else paplay /usr/share/sounds/freedesktop/stereo/message.oga; fi
